================================================================================
                              LinkDrop v1.0
                        URL Shortcut Creator for Windows
================================================================================

LinkDrop makes it easy to create .url shortcut files that link to websites.
Perfect for organizing project resources on shared network drives.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
INSTALLATION (One-Click Setup)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  1. Double-click "Install_LinkDrop.exe"
  2. Click "Yes" on the Windows security prompt
  3. Done!

This will:
  - Add "LinkDrop Here" to your right-click menu
  - Create a Desktop shortcut
  - Add LinkDrop to your Start Menu

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
HOW TO USE
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Option 1: Right-Click Context Menu (Fastest)
  1. Open any folder in Windows Explorer
  2. Right-click on empty space (not on a file)
  3. Select "LinkDrop Here"
  4. Enter name and URL
  5. Click "Create" - shortcut is saved to that folder!

Option 2: Desktop Shortcut
  1. Double-click the LinkDrop icon on your Desktop
  2. Enter name and URL
  3. Choose save location
  4. Click "Create Shortcut"

Option 3: Start Menu
  1. Click Start and find "LinkDrop"
  2. Use like the Desktop version

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
FEATURES
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  * Single Mode    - Create one shortcut at a time
  * Batch Mode     - Create multiple shortcuts at once
  * Favicon Fetch  - Automatically downloads website icons
  * Dark Mode UI   - Modern, easy-on-the-eyes interface
  * UNC Support    - Works with network paths (\\server\share\folder)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
BATCH MODE
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Create multiple shortcuts at once:
  1. Open LinkDrop
  2. Click the "Batch" tab
  3. Fill in rows with Name, URL, and optional Notes
  4. Click "+ Add Row" for more entries
  5. Click "Create All"

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
UNINSTALLING
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  1. Double-click "Uninstall_LinkDrop.exe"
  2. Click "Yes" on the Windows security prompt
  3. Confirm the removal

This removes:
  - Right-click context menu entry
  - Desktop shortcut
  - Start Menu folder

To fully remove, delete this folder after uninstalling.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
INCLUDED FILES
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  LinkDrop.exe           - Main application
  LinkDropQuick.exe      - Quick popup (used by right-click menu)
  Install_LinkDrop.exe   - One-click installer
  Uninstall_LinkDrop.exe - One-click uninstaller
  LinkDrop.ico           - Application icon

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
TROUBLESHOOTING
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

"Windows protected your PC" message:
  Click "More info" then "Run anyway" - this appears because the app
  isn't signed with a certificate.

Context menu not appearing:
  Try restarting Windows Explorer (sign out/in) or restart your PC.

Favicon not downloading:
  Some websites block favicon requests. The shortcut will still work,
  just without a custom icon.
